item.title: Dragon Claw Special Hits 0s
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

Okay well my base is Delta and my dragon claw special works and it hit all four times but 3/4 are always 0.
This is the code I have for the special against players:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true;
and against NPCS:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8);

Read full topic
